locations.name: San Francisco
locations.description: The starting point, known for iconic landmarks like the Golden Gate Bridge, charming neighborhoods, and bay views.

locations.name: Kauai
locations.description: The 'Garden Isle', famed for its dramatic cliffs, lush valleys, waterfalls (Na Pali Coast), Waimea Canyon, and beaches.

locations.name: Hawaii Island (Big Island)
locations.description: An island of contrasts featuring active volcanoes (Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park), Mauna Kea for stargazing, and unique black, green, and white sand beaches.

locations.name: Los Angeles
locations.description: The final stop, offering Hollywood glamour, Venice Beach vibes, museums, diverse dining, and Southern California culture.
